data.title: Vatican Apostolic Library
data.description: The homepage of the Vatican Apostolic Library offers an online catalog of its indexed historical resources. Among those resources, besides written ones, objects of numismatical or codicological interest can also be found. In addition, the website also provides digitized materials for the online viewer.
